contexts: Apple Inc. reported strong Q1 2024 earnings with revenue of $94.9B, beating analyst expectations of $93.2B. The company saw growth across all segments.
Tesla announced delivery numbers for Q4, showing a 10% increase year-over-year. The company continues to expand production capacity.
Microsoft's cloud business Azure grew 30% year-over-year, driving overall revenue growth. The company reported $62B in quarterly revenue.
